pr_title: CDPCP-2822. Ensure datalake is running before triggerring OID sync

timeline.bodyText: this is a duplicate of the getRangerCloudIdentitySyncStatus. could you refactor this to a common part to reduce code duplication?
timeline.author: lacikaaa

replies.author: aarman-cloudera

timeline.message:
CDPCP-2822. Ensure datalake is running before triggerring OID sync

This ensures that we only make the CM api calls to set cloud
identity configs on CM's that are running.
